title: Why not give Warmog's ARMOR some armor? While reducing its HP a bit.
body: Even if its only like 20 armor... keep the items niche "hp regen" but i feel like even after the CDR buff to it, its still outclassed.

No, they don't. Juggernauts help their team out by dealing a large amount of damage over a very short period of time, so even if they die faster they've still contributed more. If they are as tanky as tanks it becomes significantly harder to kite them for long enough to kill them. 

And as for tanks and health, Spirit Visage actually gained health this season. Randuin's Omen has as much health as it ever has had, and Zz'rot Portal is a fantastic tank item BECAUSE it has no health on it.

The items that have lost health this season are Banshee Veil (Spirit Visage has always been better) and Warmog's Armor (not a popular item on either tanks or bruisers).
